item.title: Help with ::object command
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

heres my setobject command - how do i use it?

[code] }
} else if (command.startsWith(“object”)
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Shadow”)) {

            try {
                int object = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
                int orient = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13, 14));
                int type = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(15));

                AddGlobalObj(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
                // createNewTileObject(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Bad object ID"); [/code]

keeps telling me bad object ID

Read full topic
